query:
SELECT a.id, a.name, a.programId, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mentoring_sessions ms WHERE ms.alunoId = a.id) as sessionCount
FROM alunos a 
WHERE a.name LIKE '%Amaggeldo%'
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kPX7CjhqdMFT8y.9c22f9f54902 --database 5n7arrGNHjNdoFCMzyGXcY --execute SELECT a.id, a.name, a.programId, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mentoring_sessions ms WHERE ms.alunoId = a.id) as sessionCount
FROM alunos a 
WHERE a.name LIKE '%Amaggeldo%'
